summary: Aligned header/hero to provided Figma CSS: container 1440px, RTL nav with active indicator, login button/shadow, hero layout with 810px text block, 617px search box, 500px 3D image with blur, wave background. Vite running on 5173; Laravel on 8000.
current_status: Header/hero now mirrors supplied styles; servers up (Vite:5173, Laravel:8000).
